full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement for Naval Large Tug Training

#### Reference Information

* Reference Number: WS3578596878-Doc3845539730
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3578596878
* Publication Date: 2023-02-22
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-08T14:00:00 (now expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

#### Notice Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Preselected Criteria: Lowest Price
* Limited Tendering Reason: N/A

#### Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
* Trade Agreements: (please refer to the original notice file for further details)

#### Training Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide sufficient simulated and practical training on Navy Large Tug procedures for sixteen (16) Auxiliary Fleet SOs. The goal of this training is to enable them to safely and effectively handle the new tugs, while minimizing the risk to personnel, warships, and the new tugs during the transitional period.

The successful bidder will be expected to provide training at CFB Esquimalt, following ASP Ariba files for further details and instruction.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries related to this tender notice, please contact:

Anthony, Mitch (SPAC/PSPC)
mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
